basics.name: Ellwood
basics.label: Full Software
basics.summary: I am a full stacking web developer who loves working with open source technology. I work best in planning the architecture of web applications and their development life. I also love to get the community involved and have had much experience with building and organizing large open source groups.

references.reference: Is the kind of man who follow them since. He is going to do great to work with. He was always willing to sit down and work with us on the front end to make sure our needs were being met and usually found him exceeding our expectations. He has great communication skills and was always a joy to work with. When it came to solving tough problems he was always there ready to think outside the box and was always happy to share and work out ideas until we had a working solution. I would be excited to get the chance to work with Ellwood again on any project!
references.name: Sabina Urso

references.reference: I have worked with Ellwood on several different occasions in different positions he has held. When it came time to redesign my website, he was the first person i. I outlined what I had in mind, and what I needed. He came up with several options within my guidelines and presented them to me. What I ended up with surpassed my original idea and has won me praise from my clients on how complex projects to make an it scenarios. I highly recommend him to any organization.
